meanings.definition: A rare mineral with the chemical formula Ti(AsSb)O6(OH). It is a member of the tapiolite group.
meanings.english_definition: A rare mineral with the chemical formula Ti(AsSb)O6(OH). It is a member of the tapiolite group.

examples.sentence: The vrbaite crystal was discovered in Allumiere, Italy.
examples.translation: そのvrbaiteの結晶はイタリアのアッルミエーレで発見されました。

etymology.value: Named after the Slovakian mineralogist Karel Vrba.
